00005 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Gridworld &g) {
00006   for (unsigned i = 0; i < g.ns.size(); ++i)
00007     out << " -";
00008   out << " \n";
00009 
00010   for (unsigned h = g.ew.size() - 1; h > 0; --h) {
00011     out << "| ";
00012     for (unsigned w = 0; w < g.ew[h].size(); ++w)
00013       out << (g.ew[h][w] ? "| " : "  ");

00015

00033 Gridworld::Gridworld(unsigned height, unsigned width, 
00034                      const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &northsouth,
00035                      const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &eastwest):
00036   h(height), w(width), ns(northsouth), ew(eastwest)
00037 {}
00038 
00039 Gridworld::Gridworld(unsigned height, unsigned width, Random &rng):
00040   h(height), w(width),
00041   ns(w, std::vector<bool>(h - 1, false)),
00042   ew(h, std::vector<bool>(w - 1, false))
00043 {
00044   const unsigned n = static_cast<unsigned>(sqrt(static_cast<double>(w*h)));
00045   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00046     add_obstacle(rng);
00047 }
00048 
00049 bool Gridworld::wall(unsigned nsCoord, unsigned ewCoord, unsigned dir) const {
00050   const bool isNS = 0 == dir/2;
00051   const bool isIncr = 0 == dir%2;
00052   const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &walls = isNS ? ns : ew;
00053   unsigned major = isNS ? ewCoord : nsCoord;
00054   unsigned minor = isNS ? nsCoord : ewCoord;
00055   if (!isIncr) {
00056     if (minor == 0)
00057       return true;
00058     --minor;
00059   }
00060   if (minor >= walls[major].size())
00061     return true;
00062   return walls[major][minor];
00063 }
00064 
00065 void Gridworld::add_obstacle(Random &rng) {
00066   bool direction = rng.bernoulli(0.5);
00067   std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &parallel = direction ? ns : ew;
00068   std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &perpendicular = direction ? ew : ns;
00069 
00070   unsigned seedi = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, parallel.size()) - 1;
00071   unsigned seedj = rng.uniformDiscrete(1, parallel[seedi].size()) - 1;
00072 
00073   unsigned first = seedi + 1;
00074   while (isClear(first - 1, seedj, parallel, perpendicular))
00075     --first;
00076   unsigned last = seedi;
00077   while (isClear(last + 1, seedj, parallel, perpendicular))
00078     ++last;
00079 
00080   chooseSegment(first, last, seedj, parallel, rng);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void Gridworld::chooseSegment(unsigned first,
00084                               unsigned last,
00085                               unsigned j,
00086                               std::vector<std::vector<bool> > &parallel,
00087                               Random &rng)
00088 {
00089   if (last <= first)
00090     return;
00091   unsigned maxLength = last - first;
00092   if (maxLength >= parallel.size())
00093     maxLength = parallel.size() - 1;
00094   unsigned length = maxLength > 1 ? rng.uniformDiscrete(1,maxLength) : 1;
00095   int dir = 1 - 2*rng.uniformDiscrete(0,1);
00096   unsigned start = (dir > 0) ? first : (last - 1);
00097 
00098   for (unsigned i = 0; i < length; ++i)
00099     parallel[start + i*dir][j] = true;
00100 }
